title: Ad Impression
description: Fired when an ad is displayed and viewable to the user.

adType.description: The format or type of the ad unit.

placement.description: The placement location or slot where the ad was displayed.

campaignId.description: Unique identifier for the advertising campaign.

creativeId.description: Unique identifier for the ad creative.

adSize.description: The dimensions of the ad unit (e.g. '300x250', '728x90').

adNetwork.description: The ad network or provider serving the ad.

viewableTime.description: Time the ad was viewable in milliseconds.

viewablePercent.description: Percentage of ad visible in viewport.
